Uses of Class
onbon.y2.play.AudioAreaFile

  • Packages that use AudioAreaFile 
    Package Description
    onbon.y2.play
    Y2 models for playing include the play list, the program, the standard areas, the audio, the bulletin and the dynamic area.

      Creates a audio file.

      Sets the volume, from 0 to 100.
